div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1660 Memphis, 20 km. S of Cairo, 1916 (673) Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 39 AR. From temenos of Ptah Athens: tetradr. (5th cent. 5, 4th cent. 34, many punchmarked and chisel-cut) Disposition: London Hill, NC 1917, p. 9, illus. Regling, ZfN 1927, p. 3, note 2
